name: philanthropically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that helps poor people, especially by giving them money: He was one of a group of philanthropically minded people who wanted to build schools and hospitals in the region. Many of our players are active philanthropically in the local community.
More examplesFewer examplesHer enormous fortune has enabled her to become involved philanthropically in many good causes.They are motivated philanthropically by a wish to help out people who are very poor.Some people suggested that the company could give the drug away philanthropically to people in the developing world.
